Reviews.Title: “Wonderful little hotel”
Reviews.Author: Samantha D
Reviews.Content: price paid hotel wasnt expecting little gem fantastic value money 5 minute walk termini 2 minute walk nearest metro conveniently located housed 1st floor building entrance hall lift bit jaded dont step little lobby youll pleasantly surprised compact spottlessly clean nicely decorated staff encountered stay friendly helpful bad size 3 star city hotel lovely little bathroom complete walk enclosed shower spotlessly clean couldnt fault course hear traffic windows windows shut completely sound proofed air conditioning didnt march time visit rome werent expecting breakfast wrong wonderful selection fresh pastries croissants cereal yoghurt fruit coffee machine pretty unpleasant staff offered cappucino morning delicious havent negative hotel hesitation recommending staying

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel - Close to Metro”
Reviews.Author: Brendab72
Reviews.Content: hotel wonderfully located clean faced street absolutely quiet night breakfast adequate free internet usage nice close castro pretorio station fairly close termini elevator stops floors carry luggage steps regardless floor stay pizza street frequented times near street didnt speak recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great location, great staff”
Reviews.Author: janedian000
Reviews.Content: location hotel excellent close metro train station clean quiet comfortable overly luxurious definitely nice price staff front desk friendly cleaning staff pleased choice

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Dolomiti
HotelInfo.Address: Via S. Martino della Battaglia, 11, 00185 Rome, Italy
